summary: Snippy is a dwemer droid follower inspired by BB-8 from Star Wars.
descriptionHtml:
[size=2]Snippy is a dwemer droid follower inspired by BB-8 from Star Wars. He is a non-combat follower with many functions.

[url=https://www.patreon.com/haemprojects][size=2][img]http://tesall.ru/uploads/imgs/pre_1535556014__11111.png[/img][/size][size=5]﻿[b]Support Haem Projects on Patreon![/b][/size][/url]﻿
[/size]

[center][/center][center][youtube]Lsp2Zrl6fr0[/youtube][/center]
[b][size=3]Features:[/size][/b]
[size=2]- Snippy has 128 unique voice reactions;
- Snippy has the unique follower system;
- Snippy has the manual control mod;
- Snippy will never get lost;
- Snippy is a flashlight;
- Snippy is a lockpick;
- Snippy is a scanner;
- Snippy is cute.[/size]

[b][size=3]Requirements: [/size][/b]
[size=2]All DLCs [/size]

[size=3][b]How to start:[/b][/size]
[size=2]The Controller allows you to control Snippy. It will be added to your inventory when you the load game.[/size]

[b][size=3]Uninstall: [/size][/b]
[size=2]Before uninstalling the mod, command Snippy to stop following you and drop the controller from your inventory.[/size]

[b][size=3]Third Party Content:[/size][/b]
[size=2]We used R2D2 Translator on http://www.r2d2translator.com for create Snippy's voice assets.[/size]

[b][size=3]Review:[/size][/b]

[center][youtube]cr4KLh6EfMo[/youtube][youtube]RaNSNPl0WiQ[/youtube][/center]

[b][size=3]Project AHO:[/size][/b]
[size=2]Snippy is the small part of the big AHO Project which is coming soon. Look this video for more information. [url=https://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/6168993-wip-project-aho/]See forums more information.[/url][/size]

[center][/center][center][youtube]wgwR4KUUunw[/youtube][/center]
